data.title: Bigg Boss 11: Hiten Tejwani Reacts To Hina Khan's Comments On His Marriage With Gauri Pradhan
data.meta_description: Hina had made a rather nasty analysis on Gauri's message for her husband, Hiten while he was in the house.
data.text:
Confession time: I was sincerely rooting for Hiten Tejwani as the winner while he was in the Bigg Boss house. (I am equally happy for Shilpa Shinde too. Congratulations, girl!) But speaking of Hiten, he was the perfect package, always calm & composed with a cool head. Moreover, he was the family guy amongst all the dudes in the house. His emotional meeting with his wife Gauri Pradhan and his little kids was quite stirring, TBH. And of course, it doesn’t hurt that he is good-looking too!

When Gauri sent a motivational message for her hubby, Hina had a rather nasty analysis on it. Later when Gauri visited the house, she even told Hina that it was not her place to comment on it, as the message was for Hiten only. Previously, Hina had also said that she was surprised when Hiten married Gauri as the latter doesn’t mingle with anyone.

Post the finale, when Hiten was asked about Hina’s statements, he told a leading daily:

I am a social person and Gauri isn’t. As they say, opposites attract each other. Hina does not know me or Gauri well enough to comment on my marriage. I would not respect her views if she has said that.

Irrespective of what Hina says, we love Hiten & Gauri. They are straight up #LoveGoals!
